channel.title: Catastrophe on Priceless Trainwreck
channel.description: Recent content in Catastrophe on Priceless Trainwreck

item.title: December 2024
item.description: December 2024 I don’t think there was an ELE, but i do think CIG has been mortally wounded by 1000 self-inflicted cuts (and counting) over 2024. We’ll probably know by next week how dire the situation is. I’m not saying “90 days tops,” but the next few days are critical for Parp Citizen. Poor IAE sales could induce an unrecoverable flat spin.The passengers and crew of UEE Only Constant are justifiably nervous and upset.
